title: Bezier Wrangler
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328180435/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Terminology](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328180435/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminology) : Bezier Wrangler**

An alternative to the title of [Bezier Monkey](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328180435/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bezier%20Monkey), coined by [Paul Hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328180435/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Paul%20Hunt) to denote one who is involved in the process of dititizing, cleaning up, editing, extrapolating, or interpreting the typographic works of another [type designer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328180435/http:/typophile.com/wiki/type%20designer).
author: paul d hunt
